name: alone end
description:
early concept of my game on coppercube engine

first of all i must say that game gonna be changed so all you see now its just concept and work on this "project" started six day ago for some coppercube game jam.

Can't tell what the story its be or tell somethings more then just about control (keyboard & mouse).

move on WDSA and rotate camera by pressing mouse midlebutton and Tab for pause.

for now its nothin to look on.
